Aqui, ocorre a validação de formulário, autenticação de usuário, e redirecionamento para a página de perfil.

Definição na linha 137 do arquivo LoginUnit.py.

137 
138  def run(self, request, database):
139  if request.method == "POST":
140  login_form = LoginForm(request.POST)
141  try:
142  if login_form.is_valid():
143  self.bus.validate(login_form.cleaned_data['username'],
144  login_form.cleaned_data['password'], database)
145  else:
146  raise ValueError(lang.DICT['EXCEPTION_INV_LOG'])
147  except ValueError as exc:
148  if database.__name__ == "Professor":
149  target = "proflogin"
150  elif database.__name__ == "Adm":
151  target = "364fd8cdc3a35a89b7be75bc9d10ebea"
152  elif database.__name__ == "God":
153  target = "e50b058759a52eda8a507687887186e5"
154  else:
155  target = ""
156 
157  return render(request, "Login/form.html", {'form': login_form,
158  'error': exc, 'target': target})
159  else:
160  l = None
161  cd = login_form.cleaned_data
162  if (database.__name__ != "Adm" and
163  database.__name__ != "God"):
164  l = self.bus.getLang(cd['username'], database)
165  else:
166  l = request.LANGUAGE_CODE
167  request.session['user'] = {
168  'name': cd['username'].value,
169  'password': cd['password'].value,
170  'language': l ,
171  'type': database.__name__,
172  }
173  translation.activate(l)
174  request.session[translation.LANGUAGE_SESSION_KEY] = l
175  return HttpResponseRedirect('/')
176  else:
177  login_form = LoginForm()
178 
179  if not database:
180  target = ""
181  if database.__name__ == "Professor":
182  target = "proflogin"
183  elif database.__name__ == "Adm":
184  target = "364fd8cdc3a35a89b7be75bc9d10ebea"
185  elif database.__name__ == "God":
186  target = "e50b058759a52eda8a507687887186e5"
187  else:
188  target = ""
189 
190  return render(request, "Login/form.html",
191  {'form': login_form, 'target': target})
